questList.questDescription: The Echoing Void Guardian stands in your path, a formidable protector of the Ethereal Whispers. Will you face this spectral foe in combat or seek to unite with its ethereal essence?
The Haunting Banshee's sorrowful wails echo through the Whispering Shadows Path. Can you soothe this lost soul's pain and unite your spirits for a greater cause?
The Ethereal Shade lurks in the void, a shadowed stalker of the lost. Will you vanquish this spectral threat and claim the amulet of alliance as your prize?

questList.questName: Ancient Guardian of the Abyss' Trial
questList.questDescription: The Ancient Guardian of the Abyss stands sentinel in the Ethereal Guardian's Sanctum. Will you face this mighty protector in battle or seek to unite your strength with its ancient power?
The Sentinel of the Void watches over the rusted-chain platforms, a formidable guardian of eternity. Can you forge an alliance with this spectral protector for the greater good?
The Guardian Ushabti stands firm in its duty, a soulkeeper of the lost. Will you conquer this powerful relict and claim the amulet of alliance as your reward?
The Voidborn Guardian of Shadows haunts the depths of the Wraith's Haunting Abyss, a mighty protector of the abyss. Will you rise to the challenge and claim victory over this spectral foe?
The Phantom Dreadguard stands as a shadowed sentinel of doom in the Wraith's Minions. Can you unite with this formidable guardian to heal the wounds of the abyss?
The Spectral Desolator embodies despair in the Wraith's Minions, a strong wraith of shadow. Will you bring an end to this haunting presence and claim the amulet of alliance as your prize?
